name: Space Shooter Demo Project
description:
This game is a demo project I made as an introduction to Godot with C#. As the name suggest, it's a generic space shooter with minimal features. Move the player with WASD or arrows keys and shoot with left mouse button.  Your objective is to destroy the randomly spawned enemies and avoid getting touched by them.

Source code for this project can be found here: https://github.com/paperthinc/generic-space-shooter
